Extremely fun game! The graphics are good but doesn't make your pc, allowing low end gamers to play aswell! Competetive, you can browse different online servers where you can meet with fun people and just laugh your ass off. There is a gambling risk though, and its very easy to get dragged into cases.

I've been playing this game for a while now, and i must say, the game is kinda bad. The mechanics suck, and the recoil is the most atrocious thing in any shooting game. Also, the community is as toxic and whiny as any community can get in any game. If you have even a little bit of skill, you get called out for cheating. If you slightly under-preform in comp, you get kicked. However, as much as i detest the games mechanics and community, I must say I am able to play hours on end without stopping. The game gives you such a rewarding feeling after dropping a frag. The movement is quite nice and fluid as well, which is to be expected from a game running on source. Overall, shitty community, shitty game, but, i just cant stop playing. 10/10

Эта игра не стоит ваших нервов и денег. Да она бесплатная, но покупки внутри игры никто не отменял. Я в первый день разбана играю себе спокойно мм, и тут попадается какой-то клоун и в конце раунда кикает меня(я иду на первом месте). И таких ситуаций можно привести огромное количество. КС уже умирает играйте лучше во что нибудь другое и лучше поберегите ваши нервы. Но ради веселья я думаю стоит
